q: Detroit coach Deron Williams Curry, though, felt that sticking with three guards-- Rodney Stuckey , Allen Iverson and Richard Hamilton-- was worth giving up size inside. "I thought we won that battle," he said. Yes, they posted us up a few times, but we were able to get Allen Iverson and Rip free. AI had 38 and Rip scored 30, and I'll take that. Allen Iverson led the Pistons with 38 points, and Richard Hamilton added 30.
